pageContext.publications: Proc. Soc. of Antiq. of N/C. 4th Series, Vol V, p. 328, Record of donation only.,Northumberland County History, Vol. XII, fig. 12, modestly good photograph, two aspects to full size; brief account of specimen.
pageContext.site: England,Northumberland,Dissington,2 mile E. of Stamfordham,Found by Major R. C. Hadley on the desk of the agent for the Dissington Hull Estate, who used it as a paper knife! It was a local find but details are not recorded.
